text: Neeta Lulla is an Indian fashion designer. She designed for films like Lamhe (1990), Devdas (2002 Hindi film) (2002), and Jodhaa Akbar. She gained National Film Award for Best Costume Design four times, for the above films and Balgandharva (2010).How much Neeta Lulla earns?Meet Neeta Lulla : 4 time Film National Awards winners ==National Film Awards== {| class="wikitable" ! Year !! Film !! Result |- | 1991 || Lamhe || |- | 2002 || Devdas || |- | 2008 || Jodhaa Akbar || |- | 2011 || Balgandharva || |} ==Filmfare Awards== The Filmfare Awards are one of the oldest and most prestigious Hindi film awards. They are presented annually by The Times Group for excellence of cinematic achievements. Lulla received two nominations. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" width="100%" "textcolor:#000;" ! scope="col" width=5%|Year ! scope="col" width=39%|Film ! scope="col" width=15%|Result ! scope="col" width=2%|'''''' |- ! scope="row"|2003 | Devdas | | style="text-align:center;"| |- ! scope="row"|2009 | Jodhaa Akbar | | style="text-align:center;" rowspan="2"| |- |} ==Bollywood Movie Awards== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" width="100%" "textcolor:#000;" ! scope="col" width=5%|Year ! scope="col" width=39%|Film ! scope="col" width=15%|Result |- | 2001 || Mission Kashmir || |- | 2003 || Devdas || |- |} ==IIFA Awards== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" width="100%" "textcolor:#000;" ! scope="col" width=5%|Year ! scope="col" width=39%|Film ! scope="col" width=15%|Result |- | 2000 || Taal || |- | 2009 || Jodhaa Akbar || |- |} ==Zee Cine Awards== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" width="100%" "textcolor:#000;" ! scope="col" width=5%|Year ! scope="col" width=39%|Film ! scope="col" width=15%|Result |- | 2002 || Devdas || |- |} ==Kingfisher Fashion Award== *Winner - Special Honorary Award (2005) ==India Leadership Conclave== *Winner - Fashion Designer of the Decade (2016) ==References== Category:Bollywood lists of awards and nominations Category:Lists of awards received by fashion designer
